Reviews.Title: ZTE Salute
Reviews.Author: MacklinD
Reviews.Content: Phone in excellent condition. I'm very pleased with my purchase! Absolutely nothing wrong with the phone, it's almost brand new.

Reviews.Title: Basic
Reviews.Author: Roberta C.
Reviews.Content: Great basic phone holds a good charge no data package required. Ring tones not the best but half the time it's on silent. Update phone keypad just stopped working the other day and I had to get a different one. Hope this one last more than a month and a half.

Reviews.Title: This is my second one .. !!!
Reviews.Author: Jmorgan54 "jmorgan54"
Reviews.Content: After almost a year of very good service, I lost my phone (Later found it in the clothes washer having been washed in the laundry), and so ordered my second one.  I looked at all the phones available, including the smart ones , and this one meets my requirements the best.  I really like the slide mechanism, and that it fits easily in my pocket and that it always works.  I honestly haven't found a phone that I like better, and so I continue to use this one.
